forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Becoming windy with showers developing this afternoon. High 16C. SSE winds at 15 to 25 km/h, increasing to 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Becoming windy with showers developing this afternoon. High 61F. SSE winds at 10 to 15 mph, increasing to 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain overnight. Windy. Low 14C. Winds SSE at 40 to 65 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm. Localized flooding is possible.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with evening showers evolving to a steady, soaking rain overnight. Low 57F. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch. Localized flooding is possible.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A wind driven heavy rain. High around 15C. Winds S at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 50 to 75mm of rain expected. Localized flooding is possible.
forecastday.fcttext: A wind driven heavy rain. High 58F. Winds S at 25 to 40 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 2 to 3 inches of rain expected. Localized flooding is possible.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm. Localized flooding is possible.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 48F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch. Localized flooding is possible.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High near 15C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 58F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low 42F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High near 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 58F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 44F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. High 14C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. High 57F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 9C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 48F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 13C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High around 55F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 47F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 14C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 57F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 49F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 14C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 58F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 49F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and a few passing clouds. High around 15C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 59F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low near 10C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low around 50F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 58F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.
